desc: Flat 10% Off On Pure A2 Desi Ghee | Shahji Desi Ghee - is prepared from fresh A2 Desi Gir Cow milk using traditional bilona methods. 100% natural Pure A2 Desi Cow Ghee and Gir Cow Ghee is available in 1kg and 500g packs on our website. You can buy Pure A2 Desi Ghee , Gir Cow Ghee, Sahiwal Cow Ghee etc.

layout.text:
LETS MAKE DESI GHEE
COOL AGAIN

There was a time when Desi Ghee was cool. Our Moms and Dadis used to put a dollop on our Paranthas, or make mouth-watering Gajar ka Halwa and Ladoos at home. The Ghee they made was pure and healthy, we in turn were healthy and strong. Somewhere in the midst, we lost Purity and Truthfulness and we started to eat Refined Oils/Adulterated Ghee and Unhealthy Food. Shahji Ghee brings a promise to its customers to serve #Maa Ke Haath ka Ghee and make desi ghee Cool again.
